text: The International Geography Festival is an event held every year by the Association for the Development of FIG (ADFIG). It is related to geography. It is held in Saint-Di√©-des-Vosges in France. It was first held in 1990. The festival is under the patronage of the International Geographical Union. == Other websites == * the Official website of the festival Category:Festivals Category:Geography
title: International Festival of Geography
